EmailTemplate.name: 16.Radio.AirScale.AirScal.N.G.N.2351.B.Email 2 - Zero Emissions Ebook
EmailTemplate.subject: The step-by-step plan for making your radio network emissions-free
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Cut carbon emissions and your energy bills Zero Emission Solution <[[https://pages.nokia.com/2364.Zero.Emissions.ebook.html]]> Turn the zero carbon vision into business opportunity Modernize your radio network with AirScale Base Station, deploy energy features and renewables to cut emissions and costs. Boost your profits and help tackle global warming. Read the ebook <[[https://pages.nokia.com/2364.Zero.Emissions.ebook.html]]> ► Most installed base stations waste 80 percent of the energy they take from the electricity grid, emitting more than 70 tonnes of CO2 annually on average. This could be cut to just 17 tonnes with a modern base station.
Upgrade your base station energy efficiency and add renewable energy generation. Every step you take will lower your operational costs and raise your brand image. © 2016 Nokia.
